response.overview: Beyond Final Fantasy is a bonus DVD included with the International and PAL versions of the game Final Fantasy X. It contains interviews with the game's developers and two of the game's English voice actors, James Arnold Taylor (Tidus) and Hedy Burress (Yuna). Also included are trailers for Final Fantasy X and Kingdom Hearts, a concept and promotional art gallery for the game, and a music video of "Suteki da ne" performed by Rikki.
response.title: Beyond Final Fantasy
